scripts.all: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn index && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy: graph deploy pos --node https://graph.onbeam.com/admin --ipfs https://ipfs.onbeam.com --network beam
scripts.all:test: yarn codegen:test && yarn build:test && yarn index:test && yarn deploy:test
scripts.deploy:test: graph deploy pos-testnet --node https://graph.onbeam.com/admin --ipfs https://ipfs.onbeam.com --network beam-testnet
scripts.all:sandbox: yarn codegen:sandbox && yarn build:sandbox && yarn index:sandbox && yarn deploy:sandbox
scripts.deploy:sandbox: graph deploy pos-sandbox --node http://161.35.246.70:8020 --ipfs http://161.35.246.70:5001 --network sandbox
